1: -module(parallel_messages_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -export([all/0,
    4:          suite/0,
    5:          test_throughput_benchmark/1,
    6:          test_message_queue_data_switching/1,
    7:          throughput_benchmark/0,
    8:          large_throughput_benchmark/0]).
    9: 
   10: all() -> [test_throughput_benchmark,
   11:           test_message_queue_data_switching].
   12: 
   13: suite() ->
   14:     [{timetrap, {minutes, 90}}].
   15: 
   16: get_op([{_,O}], _RandNum) ->
   17:     O;
   18: get_op([{Prob,O}|Rest], RandNum) ->
   19:     case RandNum < Prob of
   20:         true -> O;
   21:         false -> get_op(Rest, RandNum)
   22:     end.
   23: do_op(ProbHelpTab, Operations, Receiver) ->
   24:     RandNum = rand:uniform(),
   25:     Op = get_op(ProbHelpTab, RandNum),
   26:     TheOp = Operations(Op),
   27:     TheOp(Receiver).
   28: do_work(WorksDoneSoFar, ProbHelpTab, Operations, Receiver) ->
   29:     receive
   30:         stop -> WorksDoneSoFar
   31:     after
   32:         0 -> do_op(ProbHelpTab, Operations, Receiver),
   33:              do_work(WorksDoneSoFar + 1, ProbHelpTab, Operations, Receiver)
   34:     end.
   35: 
   36: -record(parallel_messages_bench_config,
   37:         {benchmark_duration_ms = 500,
   38:          recover_time_ms = 500,
   39:          thread_counts = not_set,
   40:          nr_of_repeats = 1,
   41:          report_receive_throughput = [false, true],
   42:          spawn_opts = [[{message_queue_data, off_heap}]],
   43:          scenarios =
   44:              [
   45:               [
   46:                {1.0, {message_size, 1}}
   47:               ],
   48:               [
   49:                {1.0, {exit_signal_size, 3}}
   50:               ],
   51:               [
   52:               {0.5, {exit_signal_size, 1}},
   53:               {0.5, {message_size, 1}}
   54:               ]
   55:              ],
   56:          notify_res_fun = fun(_Name, _Throughput) -> ok end,
   57:          print_result_paths_fun =
   58:              fun(ResultPath, _LatestResultPath) ->
   59:                      Comment =
   60:                          io_lib:format("<a href=\"file:///~s\">Result visualization</a>",[ResultPath]),
   61:                      {comment, Comment}
   62:              end
   63:        }).
   64: 
   65: stdout_notify_res(ResultPath, LatestResultPath) ->
   66:     io:format("Result Location: /~s~n", [ResultPath]),
   67:     io:format("Latest Result Location: ~s~n", [LatestResultPath]).
   68: 
   69: 
   70: throughput_benchmark(
   71:   #parallel_messages_bench_config{
   72:      benchmark_duration_ms  = BenchmarkDurationMs,
   73:      recover_time_ms        = RecoverTimeMs,
   74:      thread_counts          = ThreadCountsOpt,
   75:      nr_of_repeats          = NrOfRepeats,
   76:      report_receive_throughput = ReportReceiveThroughputList,
   77:      spawn_opts = SpawnOptsList,
   78:      scenarios              = Scenarios,
   79:      notify_res_fun         = NotifyResFun,
   80:      print_result_paths_fun = PrintResultPathsFun}) ->
   81:     NrOfSchedulers = erlang:system_info(schedulers),
   82:     %Parent = self(),
   83:     %% Mapping benchmark operation names to their action
   84:     Operations =
   85:         fun({message_size, Size}) ->
   86:                 case get(Size) of
   87:                     undefined ->
   88:                         Msg = lists:seq(1, Size),
   89:                         NewSendFun =
   90:                             fun(Receiver) ->
   91:                                     Receiver ! Msg
   92:                             end,
   93:                         put(Size, NewSendFun),
   94:                         NewSendFun;
   95:                     SendFun ->
   96:                         SendFun
   97:                 end;
   98:            ({exit_signal_size, Size} = SigType) ->
   99:                 case get(SigType) of
  100:                     undefined ->
  101:                         Msg = lists:seq(1, Size),
  102:                         NewSendFun =
  103:                             fun(Receiver) ->
  104:                                     erlang:exit(Receiver, Msg)
  105:                             end,
  106:                         put(SigType, NewSendFun),
  107:                         NewSendFun;
  108:                     SendFun ->
  109:                         SendFun
  110:                 end;
  111:            ({message_queue_data_change, off_heap}) ->
  112:                 fun(Receiver) ->
  113:                         Receiver ! off_heap
  114:                 end;
  115:            ({message_queue_data_change, on_heap}) ->
  116:                 fun(Receiver) ->
  117:                         Receiver ! on_heap
  118:                 end
  119:         end,
  120:     %% Helper functions
  121:     CalculateThreadCounts =
  122:         fun Calculate([Count|Rest]) ->
  123:                 case Count > NrOfSchedulers of
  124:                     true -> lists:reverse(Rest);
  125:                     false -> Calculate([Count*2,Count|Rest])
  126:                 end
  127:         end,
  128:     CalculateOpsProbHelpTab =
  129:         fun Calculate([{_, OpName}], _) ->
  130:                 [{1.0, OpName}];
  131:             Calculate([{OpPropability, OpName}|Res], Current) ->
  132:                 NewCurrent = Current + OpPropability,
  133:                 [{NewCurrent, OpName}| Calculate(Res, NewCurrent)]
  134:         end,
  135:     RenderScenario =
  136:         fun R([], StringSoFar) ->
  137:                 StringSoFar;
  138:             R([{Fraction, Operation}], StringSoFar) ->
  139:                 io_lib:format("~s ~f% ~w",[StringSoFar, Fraction * 100.0, Operation]);
  140:             R([{Fraction, Operation}|Rest], StringSoFar) ->
  141:                 R(Rest,
  142:                   io_lib:format("~s ~f% ~w, ",[StringSoFar, Fraction * 100.0, Operation]))
  143:         end,
  144:     DataHolder =
  145:         fun DataHolderFun(Data)->
  146:                 receive
  147:                     {get_data, Pid} -> Pid ! {message_bench_data, Data};
  148:                     D -> DataHolderFun([Data,D])
  149:                 end
  150:         end,
  151:     DataHolderPid = spawn_link(fun()-> DataHolder([]) end),
  152:     PrintData =
  153:         fun (Str, List) ->
  154:                 io:format(Str, List),
  155:                 DataHolderPid ! io_lib:format(Str, List)
  156:         end,
  157:     GetData =
  158:         fun () ->
  159:                 DataHolderPid ! {get_data, self()},
  160:                 receive {message_bench_data, Data} -> Data end
  161:         end,
  162:     %% Function that runs a benchmark instance and returns the number
  163:     %% of operations that were performed and how long time they took
  164:     %% to perform
  165:     RunBenchmark =
  166:         fun({NrOfProcs, Scenario, Duration, SpawnOpts}) ->
  167:                 ProbHelpTab = CalculateOpsProbHelpTab(Scenario, 0),
  168:                 ParentPid = self(),
  169:                 ReceiveFun =
  170:                     fun ReceiveFun(NrOfStops, ReceiveCount) when NrOfStops =:= NrOfProcs ->
  171:                             ParentPid ! {done_nothing_more_to_receive, ReceiveCount};
  172:                         ReceiveFun(NrOfStops, ReceiveCount) ->
  173:                             receive
  174:                                 Msg ->
  175:                                     case Msg of
  176:                                         stop ->
  177:                                             ReceiveFun(NrOfStops + 1, ReceiveCount);
  178:                                         off_heap ->
  179:                                             erlang:process_flag(message_queue_data, off_heap),
  180:                                             ReceiveFun(NrOfStops, ReceiveCount + 1);
  181:                                         on_heap ->
  182:                                             erlang:process_flag(message_queue_data, on_heap),
  183:                                             ReceiveFun(NrOfStops, ReceiveCount + 1);
  184:                                         _X ->
  185:                                             ReceiveFun(NrOfStops, ReceiveCount + 1)
  186:                                     end
  187:                             end
  188:                     end,
  189:                 Receiver =
  190:                     spawn_opt(
  191:                       fun() ->
  192:                               process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  193:                               ReceiveFun(0, 0)
  194:                       end,
  195:                       SpawnOpts),
  196:                 Worker =
  197:                     fun() ->
  198:                             receive start -> ok end,
  199:                             WorksDone =
  200:                                 do_work(0, ProbHelpTab, Operations, Receiver),
  201:                             ParentPid ! {works_done, WorksDone},
  202:                             Receiver ! stop
  203:                     end,
  204:                 ChildPids =
  205:                     lists:map(fun(_N) -> spawn_link(Worker) end, lists:seq(1, NrOfProcs)),
  206:                 erlang:garbage_collect(),
  207:                 timer:sleep(RecoverTimeMs),
  208:                 lists:foreach(fun(Pid) -> Pid ! start end, ChildPids),
  209:                 timer:sleep(Duration),
  210:                 lists:foreach(fun(Pid) -> Pid ! stop end, ChildPids),
  211:                 TotalWorksDone = lists:foldl(
  212:                                    fun(_, Sum) ->
  213:                                            receive
  214:                                                {works_done, Count} -> Sum + Count
  215:                                            end
  216:                                    end, 0, ChildPids),
  217:                 {TimeAfterSends, ok} =
  218:                     timer:tc(
  219:                       fun() ->
  220:                               receive
  221:                                   {done_nothing_more_to_receive, ReceiveCount} ->
  222:                                       %% Sanity check
  223:                                       ReceiveCount = TotalWorksDone,
  224:                                       ok
  225:                               end
  226:                       end),
  227:                 {Duration + (TimeAfterSends div 1000), TotalWorksDone}
  228:         end,
  229:     RunBenchmarkInSepProcess =
  230:         fun(ParameterTuple) ->
  231:                 P = self(),
  232:                 Results =
  233:                     [begin
  234:                          spawn_link(fun()-> P ! {bench_result, RunBenchmark(ParameterTuple)} end),
  235:                          receive {bench_result, Res} -> Res end
  236:                      end || _ <- lists:seq(1, NrOfRepeats)],
  237:                 {R1, R2} = lists:foldl(fun ({I1, I2}, {A1, A2}) ->
  238:                                                {I1 + A1, I2 + A2}
  239:                                        end, {0, 0}, Results),
  240:                 {R1 / NrOfRepeats, R2 / NrOfRepeats}
  241:         end,
  242:     RunBenchmarkAndReport =
  243:         fun(ThreadCount,
  244:             Scenario,
  245:             Duration,
  246:             ReportReceive,
  247:             SpawnOpts) ->
  248:                 {ReceiveTime, NrOfSends} =
  249:                     RunBenchmarkInSepProcess({ThreadCount,
  250:                                               Scenario,
  251:                                               Duration,
  252:                                               SpawnOpts}),
  253:                 Throughput =
  254:                     case ReportReceive of
  255:                         true ->
  256:                             NrOfSends/(ReceiveTime/1000.0);
  257:                         false ->
  258:                             NrOfSends/(Duration/1000.0)
  259:                     end,
  260:                 PrintData("; ~f",[Throughput]),
  261:                 Name = io_lib:format("Scenario: ~w, "
  262:                                      "# of Processes: ~w",
  263:                                      [Scenario, ThreadCount]),
  264:                 NotifyResFun(Name, Throughput)
  265:         end,
  266:     ThreadCounts =
  267:         case ThreadCountsOpt of
  268:             not_set ->
  269:                 CalculateThreadCounts([1]);
  270:             _ -> ThreadCountsOpt
  271:         end,
  272:     Version =
  273:         (fun() ->
  274:                  VersionString =  erlang:system_info(system_version),
  275:                  case re:run(VersionString, "\\[(source\\-[^\\]]+)\\]") of
  276:                      {match, [_, {StartPos, Length}]} ->
  277:                          string:slice(VersionString, StartPos, Length);
  278:                      _ ->
  279:                          erlang:system_info(otp_release)
  280:                  end
  281:          end)(),
  282:     %% Run the benchmark
  283:     PrintData("# Each instance of the benchmark runs for ~w seconds:~n", [BenchmarkDurationMs/1000]),
  284:     PrintData("# The result of a benchmark instance is presented as a number representing~n",[]),
  285:     PrintData("# the number of operations performed per second:~n~n~n",[]),
  286:     PrintData("# To plot graphs for the results below:~n",[]),
  287:     PrintData("# 1. Open \"$ERL_TOP/erts/test/parallel_messages_SUITE_data/visualize_throughput.html\" in a web browser~n",[]),
  288:     PrintData("# 2. Copy the lines between \"#BENCHMARK STARTED$\" and \"#BENCHMARK ENDED$\" below~n",[]),
  289:     PrintData("# 3. Paste the lines copied in step 2 to the text box in the browser window opened in~n",[]),
  290:     PrintData("#    step 1 and press the Render button~n~n",[]),
  291:     PrintData("#BENCHMARK STARTED$~n",[]),
  292:     %% The following loop runs all benchmark scenarios and prints the results (i.e, operations/second)
  293:     lists:foreach(
  294:       fun(SpawnOpts) ->
  295:               lists:foreach(
  296:                 fun(Scenario) ->
  297:                         lists:foreach(
  298:                           fun(ReportReceiveThroughput) ->
  299:                                   PrintData("Scenario: ~s, send_duration=~w ms, ~s, Spawn Options=~w$~n",
  300:                                             [case ReportReceiveThroughput of
  301:                                                  true -> "Receive Throughput";
  302:                                                  false -> "Send Throughput"
  303:                                              end,
  304:                                              BenchmarkDurationMs,
  305:                                              RenderScenario(Scenario, ""),
  306:                                              SpawnOpts]),
  307:                                   lists:foreach(
  308:                                     fun(ThreadCount) ->
  309:                                             PrintData("; ~w",[ThreadCount])
  310:                                     end,
  311:                                     ThreadCounts),
  312:                                   PrintData("$~n",[]),
  313:                                   PrintData(Version,[]),
  314:                                   lists:foreach(
  315:                                     fun(ThreadCount) ->
  316:                                             %erlang:display({thread_count, ThreadCount}),
  317:                                             RunBenchmarkAndReport(ThreadCount,
  318:                                                                   Scenario,
  319:                                                                   BenchmarkDurationMs,
  320:                                                                   ReportReceiveThroughput,
  321:                                                                   SpawnOpts)
  322:                                     end,
  323:                                     ThreadCounts),
  324:                                   PrintData("$~n",[])
  325:                           end,
  326:                           ReportReceiveThroughputList)
  327:                 end,
  328:                 Scenarios)
  329:       end,
  330:       SpawnOptsList),
  331:     PrintData("~n#BENCHMARK ENDED$~n~n",[]),
  332:     DataDir = filename:join(filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)), "parallel_messages_SUITE_data"),
  333:     TemplatePath = filename:join(DataDir, "visualize_throughput.html"),
  334:     {ok, Template} = file:read_file(TemplatePath),
  335:     OutputData = string:replace(Template, "#bench_data_placeholder", GetData()),
  336:     OutputPath1 = filename:join(DataDir, "message_bench_result.html"),
  337:     {{Year, Month, Day}, {Hour, Minute, Second}} = calendar:now_to_datetime(erlang:timestamp()),
  338:     StrTime = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~4..0w-~2..0w-~2..0wT~2..0w:~2..0w:~2..0w",[Year,Month,Day,Hour,Minute,Second])),
  339:     OutputPath2 = filename:join(DataDir, io_lib:format("message_bench_result_~s.html", [StrTime])),
  340:     file:write_file(OutputPath1, OutputData),
  341:     file:write_file(OutputPath2, OutputData),
  342:     PrintResultPathsFun(OutputPath2, OutputPath1).
  343: 
  344: 
  345: throughput_benchmark() ->
  346:     throughput_benchmark(
  347:       #parallel_messages_bench_config{
  348:          benchmark_duration_ms = 500,
  349:          recover_time_ms = 500,
  350:          thread_counts = not_set,
  351:          nr_of_repeats = 1,
  352:          report_receive_throughput = [false, true],
  353:          spawn_opts = [[{message_queue_data, off_heap}]],
  354:          scenarios =
  355:              [
  356:               [
  357:                {1.0, {message_size, 1}}
  358:               ],
  359:               [
  360:                {1.0, {exit_signal_size, 3}}
  361:               ],
  362:               [
  363:                {0.5, {exit_signal_size, 1}},
  364:                {0.5, {message_size, 1}}
  365:               ]
  366:              ],
  367:          notify_res_fun = fun(_Name, _Throughput) -> ok end,
  368:          print_result_paths_fun =
  369:              fun(ResultPath, _LatestResultPath) ->
  370:                      Comment =
  371:                          io_lib:format("<a href=\"file:///~s\">Result visualization</a>",[ResultPath]),
  372:                      {comment, Comment}
  373:              end
  374:         }).
  375: 
  376: test_throughput_benchmark(_) ->
  377:     throughput_benchmark().
  378: 
  379: large_throughput_benchmark() ->
  380:     throughput_benchmark(
  381:       #parallel_messages_bench_config{
  382:          benchmark_duration_ms = 1000,
  383:          recover_time_ms = 1000,
  384:          thread_counts = [1,2,4,8,15,16,31,32,47,48,63,64],
  385:          nr_of_repeats = 3,
  386:          report_receive_throughput = [false, true],
  387:          spawn_opts = [[{message_queue_data, off_heap}]],
  388:          scenarios =
  389:              [
  390:               [
  391:                {1.0, {message_size, 1}}
  392:               ],
  393:               [
  394:                {1.0, {message_size, 10}}
  395:               ],
  396:               [
  397:                {1.0, {message_size, 100}}
  398:               ],
  399:               [
  400:                {1.0, {message_size, 1000}}
  401:               ],
  402:               [
  403:                {1.0, {exit_signal_size, 1}}
  404:               ],
  405:               [
  406:                {1.0, {exit_signal_size, 10}}
  407:               ],
  408:               [
  409:                {1.0, {exit_signal_size, 100}}
  410:               ],
  411:               [
  412:                {1.0, {exit_signal_size, 1000}}
  413:               ],
  414:               [
  415:                {0.5, {exit_signal_size, 1}},
  416:                {0.5, {message_size, 1}}
  417:               ],
  418:               [
  419:                {0.5, {exit_signal_size, 10}},
  420:                {0.5, {message_size, 10}}
  421:               ],
  422:               [
  423:                {0.5, {exit_signal_size, 100}},
  424:                {0.5, {message_size, 100}}
  425:               ],
  426:               [
  427:                {0.5, {exit_signal_size, 1000}},
  428:                {0.5, {message_size, 1000}}
  429:               ]
  430:              ],
  431:          notify_res_fun =
  432:              fun(Name, Throughput) ->
  433:                      io:format("~n~n#Name: ~s Throughput: ~w~n~n", [Name, Throughput])
  434:              end,
  435:          print_result_paths_fun =
  436:              fun stdout_notify_res/2
  437:        }).
  438: 
  439: test_message_queue_data_switching(_) ->
  440:     throughput_benchmark(
  441:       #parallel_messages_bench_config{
  442:          benchmark_duration_ms = 100,
  443:          recover_time_ms = 500,
  444:          thread_counts = [1,2,4],
  445:          nr_of_repeats = 1,
  446:          report_receive_throughput = [true],
  447:          spawn_opts = [[{message_queue_data, off_heap}]],
  448:          scenarios =
  449:              [
  450:               [
  451:                {0.499995, {exit_signal_size, 1}},
  452:                {0.499995, {message_size, 1}},
  453:                %% About 1 in 100k changes message data type
  454:                {0.000005, {message_queue_data_change, off_heap}},
  455:                {0.000005, {message_queue_data_change, on_heap}}
  456:               ]
  457:              ],
  458:          notify_res_fun = fun(_Name, _Throughput) -> ok end,
  459:          print_result_paths_fun =
  460:              fun(ResultPath, _LatestResultPath) ->
  461:                      Comment =
  462:                          io_lib:format("<a href=\"file:///~s\">Result visualization</a>",[ResultPath]),
  463:                      {comment, Comment}
  464:              end
  465:        }).
